column4: quick question. I am trying to create my own custom panel type thing (i dont even know what exactly to call it) i want a button in the middle of the screen that i can click on and it pulls open a menu bar anyone have a clue where i should even start?
you seriously want a button right in the middle of your screen? That sounds quite annoying.
go to system>preferences>apearence and turn the desktop effects off or down
yea its an idea im working with
